text: Sultan Azlan Muhibbuddin Shah ibni Almarhum Sultan Yussuff Izzuddin Shah Ghafarullahu-lah, GCB, KStJ (19 April 1928 â€“ 28 May 2014) was the ninth Yang di-Pertuan Agong of Malaysia. He was the Yang di-Pertuan Agong from 26 April 1989 to 25 April 1994. Azlan died in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia from an illness, aged 86. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Yang di-Pertuan Agong Category:Alumni of the University of Nottingham Category:People from Perak
title: Azlan Shah of Perak
